Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Documentary papyrus with remains of accounts and of drachmas, sometimes specified (made of gold in line 3). The sums disclose considerably high quantities, as higher monetary units (talents) occur on several occasions. Negligible traces of faded texts exist on the verso.
